# Canary Deployment Flow Visualization

## Complete Pipeline Flow

```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Push to main] --> B{UAT Gate}
    B --> C[Automated Tests]
    C --> D[Lint & Type Check]
    C --> E[Unit Tests]
    C --> F[E2E Tests]
    C --> G[Newman API Tests]

    D --> H{All Tests Pass?}
    E --> H
    F --> H
    G --> H

    H -->|No| I[âŒ Fail Pipeline]
    H -->|Yes| J[Manual Approval Gate]

    J -->|Rejected| I
    J -->|Approved| K[Build & Push]

    K --> L[Docker Build]
    L --> M[Push to GHCR]
    M --> N[Tag: canary-run_number]

    N --> O[ğŸš€ Canary Stage 1]
    O --> P[Deploy 1 Pod]
    P --> Q[10% Traffic]
    Q --> R[Monitor 15 min]

    R -->|Failed| S[Auto Rollback]
    R -->|Success| T[ğŸš€ Canary Stage 2]

    T --> U[Scale to 2 Pods]
    U --> V[50% Traffic]
    V --> W[Monitor 30 min]

    W -->|Failed| S
    W -->|Success| X[ğŸš€ Canary Stage 3]

    X --> Y[Update Main Deployment]
    Y --> Z[Scale to 3 Pods]
    Z --> AA[100% Traffic]
    AA --> AB[Cleanup Canary]

    AB --> AC[Smoke Tests]
    AC -->|Failed| S
    AC -->|Success| AD[âœ… Deployment Complete]

    S --> AE[Rollback to Previous]
    AE --> AF[âŒ Deployment Failed]

    style A fill:#e1f5ff
    style AD fill:#c8e6c9
    style AF fill:#ffcdd2
    style I fill:#ffcdd2
    style J fill:#fff9c4
    style O fill:#bbdefb
    style T fill:#90caf9
    style X fill:#64b5f6
    style S fill:#ff5252
```

## Timeline Visualization
